alert.note: Alert for Aguas Buenas; Barranquitas; Ciales; Cidra; Comerio; Corozal; Morovis; Naranjito; Orocovis (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 18 at 2:30PM ADT until September 18 at 6:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Aguas Buenas County in Puerto Rico... Barranquitas County in Puerto Rico... Ciales County in Puerto Rico... Cidra County in Puerto Rico... Comerio County in Puerto Rico... Corozal County in Puerto Rico... Morovis County in Puerto Rico... Naranjito County in Puerto Rico... Orocovis County in Puerto Rico... * Until 530 PM AST. * At 130 PM AST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Mudslides and Rockfall in areas of steep terrain. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Orocovis, Barranquitas, Corozal, Morovis, Naranjito, Comerio, Ciales, Cidra, Aguas Buenas, Franquez, Barahona, Palomas, Santa Clara, Parcelas La Milagr, Parcelas La Milagrosa, Parcelas Nuevas and Sumidero. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Aguas Buenas; Barranquitas; Ciales; Cidra; Comerio; Corozal; Morovis; Naranjito; Orocovis
